questionTitle: You can join the club when you ________ a bit older.
If you ________ your money to mine, we shall have enough.
I'll phone as soon as I ________ to London.
We decided ________ at home this afternoon.
He kept ________ the same thing again and again.
They ________ our party about eleven.
Paul ________ with us for about nine days by now.
Last year I ________ all of my books in my office.
I'm afraid I ________ my gloves when I was walking home.
Mark prefers cycling ________ driving.
Your sister used to visit you quite often, ________?
After the way she treated you, if I ________ in your place, I wouldn't return the call.
I think that you had better ________ earlier so that you can get to class on time.
I have finished typing all ________ the last page.
There is no reason to ________ the man simply because you do not agree with him.
I'm a sharp cookie. There's no way anybody can pull the wool over my ________.
If that firm wants to attract workers, it must ________ the pay.
The lung transplant operation was ________ complicated and the doctors had to take special care to ensure its success.
Anne's boss is sometimes forgetful ________ the promises he has made.
I am glad so many people have passed the test. In fact, there were ________ who haven't.
